products.name: Smart Watch Pro
products.description: Advanced smartwatch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and 5-day battery life. Perfect for fitness enthusiasts.

products.name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
products.description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.

products.name: Ultra HD Webcam
products.description: 4K webcam with auto-focus and low-light correction for crystal clear video calls.

products.name: Ergonomic Gaming Mouse
products.description: RGB gaming mouse with 16000 DPI sensor and 8 programmable buttons.

products.name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
products.description: RGB mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX switches and multimedia controls.

products.name: Portable Power Bank
products.description: 20000mAh power bank with fast charging and dual USB ports.

products.name: Wireless Charging Pad
products.description: 15W fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices.

products.name: USB-C Hub
products.description: 7-in-1 USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, and SD card reader.

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Waterproof portable speaker with 24-hour battery life and deep bass.

products.name: Gaming Headset
